headline: Ahold Delhaize USA and The Campbell’s Company Launch Regenerative Agriculture Pilot to Reduce Scope 3 Emissions Associated with Potato Farming
summary: Ahold Delhaize USA and The Campbell’s Company Launch Regenerative Agriculture Pilot Ahold Delhaize USA and The Campbell’s Company Launch Regenerative Agriculture Pilot to Reduce Scope 3 Emissions Associated with Potato Farming.
